column4: if i ran: "apt-get install linux-headers-server linux-image-server linux-server" to get my 32bit ubuntu install to recognize my 14gb of ram rather than just 4gb... should i grab the VMware Player Linux 32-bit .bundle or the 64bit .bundle?
32bit if ur using 32bit linux, which i assume u are,o therwise you wouldnt need the server kernel
yea i installed a 32bit version then ran "sudo apt-get install linux-headers-server linux-image-server linux-server"
